遣って行く: (やっていく) - to live; to make a living; to get on with
遣って見る: (やってみる) - to have a go; to try and do (something); to take a chance with something
遣って退ける: (やってのける) - to succeed (in doing); to pull something off; to manage (to do a job)
遣っ付ける: (やっつける) - to beat; to attack (an enemy); to do away with; to finish off
遣っ付け仕事: (やっつけしごと) - rush job; quick-and-dirty work
遣らかす: (やらかす) - to perpetrate; to do; to be guilty of
遣らす: (やらす) - to allow; to let (somebody) do; to make (somebody) do
遣らずの雨: (やらずのあめ) - rain that starts to fall as though trying to prevent a guest from leaving
遣らずぶったくり: (やらずぶったくり) - all take and no give; rip-off
遣らずぼったくり: (やらずぼったくり) - all take and no give; rip-off
遣らずもがな: (やらずもがな) - needn't be done; as well not to do; shouldn't have been done
遣らせる: (やらせる) - to allow; to let (somebody) do; to make (somebody) do
遣られる: (やられる) - to suffer damage; to be deceived
遣りこなす: (やりこなす) - to manage (to do successfully); to get through
遣りつける: (やりつける) - to be accustomed to; to be used to; to argue into silence; to talk down
遣りなおす: (やりなおす) - to do over again; to redo; to start over; to remake; to resume; to recommence
遣りにくい: (やりにくい) - hard-to-do; difficult; tough; awkward; tricky
遣り付ける: (やりつける) - to be accustomed to; to be used to; to argue into silence; to talk down
遣り兼ねない: (やりかねない) - capable of anything; liable to do
遣り切れない: (やりきれない) - unable to finish (on time, etc.); unbearable/intolerable/beyond endurance/too much
遣り取り: (やりとり) - giving and taking; exchange (of letters); arguing back and forth; (conversational) exchange
遣り合う: (やりあう) - to compete with; to argue with; to quarrel
遣り場: (やりば) - place of refuge (figurative); outlet (for an emotion, anger, etc.)
遣り手: (やりて) - doer; giver; skilled person/capable person/shrewd person/go-getter/hotshot; brothel madam
遣り抜く: (やりぬく) - to carry out to completion; to accomplish
遣り損じ: (やりそんじ) - mistake; error; blunder; failure
遣り損じる: (やりそんじる) - to botch/to bungle/to fail; to drive badly (e.g. a car)
遣り損ずる: (やりそんずる) - to botch/to bungle/to fail; to drive badly (e.g. a car)
遣り方: (やりかた) - manner of doing; way; method; means
遣り様: (やりよう) - way of doing something
遣り水: (やりみず) - stream (in a Japanese garden)/narrow stream flowing through a traditional garden (esp. in a Heian period villa); watering (potted plants, bonsai, etc.)
遣り熟す: (やりこなす) - to manage (to do successfully); to get through
遣り直す: (やりなおす) - to do over again; to redo; to start over; to remake; to resume; to recommence
遣り繰り: (やりくり) - making do; getting by (somehow); managing
遣り繰り算段: (やりくりさんだん) - managing to get by
遣り込める: (やりこめる) - to talk down; to corner someone in an argument
遣り返す: (やりかえす) - to do over; to answer or fire back; to retort
遣り逃げ: (やりにげ) - breaking off contact with someone after having sex with them; wham-bam-thank-you-ma'am; hit it and quit it; fuck and chuck
遣り通す: (やりとおす) - to carry through; to achieve; to complete
遣り過ぎる: (やりすぎる) - to overdo; to go too far; to go to excess
遣り過す: (やりすごす) - to let something (or somebody) go past; to do too much
遣り難い: (やりにくい) - hard-to-do; difficult; tough; awkward; tricky
遣る: (やる) - to do/to undertake/to perform/to play (a game)/to study; to send/to dispatch/to despatch; to put/to move/to turn (one's head, glance, etc.); to give (esp. to someone of equal or lower status)/to let have/to present/to bestow/to confer; to make (a vehicle) go faster; to run (a business)/to keep/to be engaged in/to practice (law, medicine, etc.)/to practise; to have (food, drink, etc.)/to eat/to drink/to smoke; to hold (a performance)/to perform/to show; to ease (one's mind); to harm/to injure/to kill; to have sex with; to live/to get by/to get along; (after the -masu stem of a verb, often in the negative) to do ... completely; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to do ... broadly/to do ... to a great distance; (after the -te form of a verb) to do ... for (someone of equal or lower status)/to do ... to (sometimes with negative nuance); (after the -te form of a verb) to make active efforts to ...
遣るかたない: (やるかたない) - unable to clear away one's ill feeling; not able to do anything (about...)
遣るかた無い: (やるかたない) - unable to clear away one's ill feeling; not able to do anything (about...)
遣る方ない: (やるかたない) - unable to clear away one's ill feeling; not able to do anything (about...)
遣る方無い: (やるかたない) - unable to clear away one's ill feeling; not able to do anything (about...)
遣る気: (やるき) - willingness (e.g. to do something); eagerness; motivation; inspiration; determination; high aspirations
遣る気充分: (やるきじゅうぶん) - sufficiently motivated (to do something)
遣る気十分: (やるきじゅうぶん) - sufficiently motivated (to do something)
遣る瀬ない: (やるせない) - helpless; cheerless; miserable; disconsolate; dreary; downhearted
遣る瀬無い: (やるせない) - helpless; cheerless; miserable; disconsolate; dreary; downhearted
遣わす: (つかわす) - to send/to dispatch/to despatch; (after て form, slightly pompous) to bestow (favour, etc.)/to grant (e.g. pardon)
遣外: (けんがい) - dispatched abroad; despatched abroad
遣手: (やりて) - doer; giver; skilled person/capable person/shrewd person/go-getter/hotshot; brothel madam
遣水: (やりみず) - stream (in a Japanese garden)/narrow stream flowing through a traditional garden (esp. in a Heian period villa); watering (potted plants, bonsai, etc.)
遣隋使: (けんずいし) - Japan's envoy to Sui dynasty China
遥々: (はるばる) - from afar; over a great distance; all the way
遥か: (はるか) - far; far away; distant; remote; far off
遥かに: (はるかに) - far off; in the distance; long ago; far; by far; far and away
遥か遠く: (はるかとおく) - far away in the distance; in the far distance
遥遠: (ようえん) - far away; very far off; remote
遥遥: (はるばる) - from afar; over a great distance; all the way
適う: (かなう) - (esp. 叶う) to come true (wish); to be suited; (esp. 敵う) to match (implies competition)/to rival/to bear (e.g. I can't bear the heat)
適える: (かなえる) - (esp. 叶える) to grant (request, wish)/to answer (prayer); (esp. 適える) to fulfill (conditions)/to meet (requirements)
適した: (てきした) - adequate (for); suitable (to, for); appropriate (for); proper
適する: (てきする) - to fit; to suit
適に: (たまに) - occasionally; once in a while
適わない: (かなわない) - no match for; unbearable; unable/can't do/beyond one's power
適中: (てきちゅう) - striking home/hitting the mark; coming true/proving to be right/becoming realized
適任者: (てきにんしゃ) - suitable person; well-qualified person; responsible party; responsible person
適例: (てきれい) - exemplification; good example; case in point
適切: (てきせつ) - pertinent; appropriate; adequate; relevance
適合: (てきごう) - conformity; compatibility; adaptability; congruity; congruence
適合する実装: (てきごうするじっそう) - conforming implementation
